title: Mountain - Eruption (2004) [FLAC]
description:
Mountain - Eruption is a barely known 2CD-Set released in 2004. Both CD's include 7 tracks with live recordings from the post-Pappalardi era. CD1 was recorded live in New York City 1985, CD2 during the European tour 2003. But both CD's include a hidden Track 8 - not mentioned in the official tracklist. Both tracks (Stormy Monday & Dirty Shoes) were recorded with the classic lineup (West, Pappalardi, Laing, Knight) - most probable at the Olympic Auditorium, Los Angeles, CA on March 7, 1970. maxblues


Mountain - Eruption
Label: Snapper Music - SMDCD 515
Format: 2 Ã— CD, Album
Country: UK
Released: 2004
Genre: Rock
Style: Hard Rock


Tracklist:

Disc 1 - Live In NYC 1985:
1-1 	Hard Times 	
1-2 	Never In My Life 	
1-3 	Spark 	
1-4 	Theme For An Imaginary Western 	
1-5 	Nantucket Sleighride (To Owen Coffin) 	
1-6 	Mississippi Queen 	
1-7 	Rocky Mountain Way
Hidden Bonus Track
1-8	Stormy Monday 

Tracks 1-7 recorded April 12, 1985, at L'Amour and June 5, 1985 at The Ritz
Lineup: Leslie West (g, v) - Corky laing (d, v) - Mark Clarke (b, v)

Track 8 recorded at the Olympic Auditorium, Los Angeles, CA on March 7, 1970 (most probably)
Lineup: Leslie West (g, v) - Felix Pappalardi (b) - Corky Laing (d) - Steve Knight (organ)

	
Disc 2 - Live In Europe 2003:

2-2 	For Yasgur's Farm 	
2-3 	Crossroads 	
2-4 	The Sea 	
2-5 	Nantucket Sleighride (To Owen Coffin) 	
2-6 	House Of The Rising Sun 	
2-7 	Dreams Of Milk And Honey
Hidden Bonus Track
2-8	Dirty Shoes

Tracks 1-7 recorded during the European Tour 2003
Lineup: Leslie West (g, v) - Corky Laing (d, v) - Richie Scarlet (b, v)

Track 8 recorded at the Olympic Auditorium, Los Angeles, CA on March 7, 1970 (most probably)
Lineup: Leslie West (g, v) - Felix Pappalardi (b) - Corky Laing (d) - Steve Knight (organ)
